article_title: Gofundme.com is making a difference in the life of a chronically ill child in Attleboro
article_text:
Aurora Primo at Childrens Hosp Aurora Primo, left, her father Alberto Cruz, her sister Rosie Delomba-Cruz, 7, and Nadine Miner, Alberto's girlfriend, pose Saturday at Boston Children's Hospital, where she's undergoing treatment for leukemia. Her family set up a GoFundMe online account to help with expenses associated with her care. (Staff photo by Mark Stockwell)

Aurora Primo at Childrens Hosp Aurora Primo, a student at Hyman-Fine Elementary School in Attleboro, on Saturday shows some get-well cards from her classmates. She's undergoing treatment for leukemia at Boston Children's Hospital. Her family set up a GoFundMe online account to help with expenses associated with her care. (Staff photo by Mark Stockwell)

Aurora Primo at Childrens Hosp Aurora Primo of Attleboro reads some get-well cards from her classmates as her sister, Rosie Delomba-Cruz, 7, looks on. In the background is Nadine Miner, the girlfriend of Aurora's father, Alberto Cruz, far right. She's undergoing treatment for leukemia at Boston Children's Hospital. Her family set up a GoFundMe online account to help with expenses associated with her care. (Staff photo by Mark Stockwell)

Aurora Primo at Childrens Hosp There are some of Aurora Primo's get-well cards. She's undergoing treatment for leukemia at Boston Children's Hospital. Her family set up a GoFundMe online account to help with expenses associated with her care. (Staff photo by Mark Stockwell)

aurora primo IV Aurora Primo. (Submitted photo)

aurora primo III Aurora Primo. (Submitted photo)

aurora primo II Aurora Primo. (Submitted photo)

og.description: For 10-year-old Aurora Primo, this should be a time of sleepovers, sledding and having fun with her friends.
